it.title: Scrittura accademica - Definizione del concetto
it.prompt: As a top researcher and specialist in [Fields], provide a detailed explanation of the concept of [QUESTION]. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Italian. Your response should cover its origin, theoretical foundations, common constituents, requirements for application, key references, and any other relevant information you deem necessary to provide a comprehensive understanding.
